title: All-Inclusive Luxury in the Kimberley Region
description: Be one of the privileged few to lay eyes upon the breathtaking Kimberley Region in WA. Stay in award-winning luxury at the one-of-a-kind Berkeley River Lodge and enjoy an all-inclusive four-night stay in a private villa, includes all meals: breakfasts, lunches, nightly five-course degustation dinners, unlimited beverages, daily excursions, return plane transfers from Darwin and more for two.

title: Once-in-a-Lifetime All-Inclusive Outback Luxury with Private Plane Transfers
description:
You’ve never been this far away... On the rugged tip of Western Australia in the wilderness of the Kimberley, there’s a place so breathtakingly secluded and exclusive, it’s called Faraway Bay. Offering the utmost privacy with 180-degree vistas of the spectacular cliff-lined bay, this multi-award-winning outback paradise is so remote it’s only accessible by private aircraft charter (included in your package).

Your one-of-a-kind stay includes four nights in one of just eight bush cabins and return charter plane transfers from Darwin or Kununurra, ensuring an unforgettable arrival in this unspoiled part of Australia. All meals are included: enjoy daily breakfast, gourmet lunch or picnic hamper and nightly three-course dinner, with all-inclusive non-alcoholic drinks and one nightly glass of beer, wine or spirit per adult. Plus, discover this breathtaking region with a range of complimentary daily excursions including cruises to the iconic King George Falls, 4WD safaris, fishing and billabong expeditions.

**Exclusive departure dates**: Choose from 10 exclusive departure dates from April 2021.
offer_address: Faraway Bay North Kimberley WA 6743 Australia
